name: Jigsaw PuzzleMaster
description:
Jigsaw puzzles PuzzleMaster will bring you hours of joy playing jigsaw puzzles. All puzzles are free to play. For real jigsaw lovers there is a premium version with extra features and without advertisements.

Start playing a classic jigsaw puzzle now to relax or train your brain. Easy to use app with a lot of choices for different number of pieces. This jigsaw puzzle game has over 2000 free HD photos and a daily puzzle of the day. Also you can create a puzzle from your own photo gallery.

We have integrated the best features from all jigsaw games in the store to meet our goal to develop the best premium quality puzzle app.

Our most important requirements during creating this game:

1. Easy to use.
2. Great quality HD photos.
3. Best jigsaw game in the PlayStore.

All top features:

1. All puzzles can be played for free. In return for not locking puzzles, we show some advertisements. You are able to buy the premium app to remove the advertisements.
2. Difficulty settings (8 difficulty levels per puzzle out of 4,6,9,12,16,24,36,54,81,96,121,150,169,216,256,384,400,600 pieces)
3. Magical puzzle creator: create puzzles from your own photos (free!)!
4. Over 2000 high quality HD puzzles in different categories (e.g. animals, cats, horses, dogs, landscapes, nature, art, adventure and many more)
5. New puzzles are added regularly. Every category has a balanced set of difficulty. Great for adults but also for kids.
6. Puzzle of the day. Get your daily new puzzle!
7. Weekly leaderboard ranking world wide and for your country.
8. Gallery of your finished puzzles.
9. 3 different modes how to handle pieces (free play, magnetic grid, rotating pieces)
10. Preview of the puzzles during play.
11. Zoom to make it easier to see small pieces.
12. Option to only show the edge pieces.
13. Move all pieces from the stock to the board.
14. New puzzle packs added regularly!
15. Automated saving of puzzles in progress.
16. Puzzles suitable for both adults and children.
17. Share your puzzles with your friends and family.

Puzzling is great for relaxing or for brain training, so download this game now and start puzzling.

You are able to play this for free. In return we will show some advertisements. If you don't like the advertisements, you are able to buy the premium version without ads.

Please send your suggestions and remarks to: info@2-monkeys.nl.
